mapper.select: SELECT product_idx, product_name, cart_qty, (product_price * cart_qty) AS product_price, delivery_cost FROM t_basket WHERE cart_qty > 0 ORDER BY product_idx DESC
SELECT product_idx, product_name, success_qty, product_price, delivery_cost FROM t_basket WHERE success_qty > 0 ORDER BY product_idx DESC
SELECT SUM(product_price * cart_qty) AS bs_cost, MAX(delivery_cost) AS ds_cost, (SUM(product_price * cart_qty) + MAX(delivery_cost)) AS final_cost FROM t_basket WHERE cart_qty > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_basket (product_name, cart_qty, product_price, delivery_cost) VALUES (#{productName}, #{cartQty}, #{productPrice}, #{deliveryCost})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_basket SET cart_qty = 0 WHERE product_idx = #{productIdx}
UPDATE t_basket SET success_qty = success_qty + cart_qty, product_stock_cnt = product_stock_cnt - cart_qty, cart_qty = 0 WHERE cart_qty > 0
